description.value:
Carries up to 30-50kg. Taking an object out requires a Full Action. Mutually exlusive with a Combat Vest. Usually takes a Full Action to take something out of it.

Requirements

Worn on the back (duh)

Effect: Plentiful

Notes: 10 T
